<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Given a ConvergenceRegion tree with |Start| as its root, finds the smallest</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// region |Entry| belongs to. If |Entry| does not belong to the region defined</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// by |Start|, this function returns |nullptr|.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/spirv/anonymous-spirvconvergenceregionanalysis-cpp-/#a2846f57b5b41783866a21eca418ed4b3"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirv/convergenceregion">ConvergenceRegion</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/spirv/anonymous-spirvconvergenceregionanalysis-cpp-/#a2846f57b5b41783866a21eca418ed4b3">findParentRegion</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirv/convergenceregion">ConvergenceRegion</a> &#42;Start,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">                                    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Entry) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirv/convergenceregion">ConvergenceRegion</a> &#42;Candidate = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirv/convergenceregion">ConvergenceRegion</a> &#42;NextCandidate = Start;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Candidate != NextCandidate &amp;&amp; NextCandidate != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">    Candidate = NextCandidate;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">    NextCandidate = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// End of the search, we can return.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Candidate-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirv/convergenceregion/#a03d34ea2d838e32c2f5b374a650090c7">Children</a>.size() == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Candidate;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Child : Candidate-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirv/convergenceregion/#a03d34ea2d838e32c2f5b374a650090c7">Children</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Child-&gt;Blocks.count(Entry) != 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">        NextCandidate = Child;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Candidate;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// anonymous namespace</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
